mapper.update: update admin set admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_open_active = #{isOpenActive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_picture = #{adminPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_other_one = #{adminOtherOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_other_two = #{adminOtherTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_other_three = #{adminOtherThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_other_four = #{adminOtherFour,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_other_five = #{adminOtherFive,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_password, is_open_active, admin_picture, admin_other_one, admin_other_two, admin_other_three, admin_other_four, admin_other_five from admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
